message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $115. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $100 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
I understand you're looking for the best deal, Bob. While I value this product highly, I'm willing to come down to $110.  I'm confident you won't find this value elsewhere.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $105 for the product. I hope this meets within your expectations.
